item.description:
let's meetup at the midway cafe in jamaica plain to see a great blues band, The Mike Null Blues Band. they've recently returned from a three month gig at The House of Blues and Jazz in shanghai and they're playing in the boston area until they return to shanghai in july.

we caught them at the midway on monday, 11 january, and they were just fantastic. mike null, formerly of the chicken slacks, may very well be the best guitarist in boston right now and his vocals, as well as the playing and vocals of his bandmates, are also top-notch.

for example, check out this youtube video of the band at the HOBAJ with mike ripping it up on guitar and vocals. (go to about the 3:40 mark to see mike's guitar solo.)

the details:

there are three bands playing:

  • jamie lynn hart
  • the mike null blues band
  • dr. jc and the backwater blues


(mike is playing guitar for all three bands.)

this is a 21+ show, doors at 8pm, $8 cover.

(see the midway facebook page for complete details.)
item.how_to_find_us: i'll be at the bar at 8-8:15 and i'll email a cell # to Yes and Maybe RSVPs late in the afternoon before the show
item.name: The Mike Null Blues Band @ The Midway Cafe
